website_summaries.verdict: A fun steel/canvas wagon you can fold up for trunk storage and use with ease on beach days.
pros: Can be used in other situations (ball games, outdoor concerts) as well
cons: Some owners say it doesn't pull well in sand, though most say it works well for them on the beach

customer_reviews.title: It is NOT useful to go to the beach
customer_reviews.text: I've seen several wagons here, but what this one got my attention was its design. It looks better than most of the competition and it has indeed a very sturdy build. Unfortunately, I can't recommend it if you want a beach wagon. it gets stuck on the sand and is even less convenient than carrying everything by yourself. I had to return it but don't get me wrong, for everything else I believe is a competent product.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Rodríguez

customer_reviews.title: Ok on the beach
customer_reviews.text: It seems impossible to find a wagon that rolls over sand at the beach easily. This is better than my last one from Costco bc the tires are rubber & large, but it could be better.
customer_reviews.author: andrew w winslow

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great cart! Instructions were simple causing set up & fold up to be easy! Doesn’t roll as well on soft sand as I had read in the reviews. But overall a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea W. Mesplay

customer_reviews.title: Appears to Be a Sturdy Little Wagon
customer_reviews.text: It looks really nice and sturdy and it appears to be heavy duty. The proof is in the pudding they say - we are going to the beach in may so we will see how it performs and maybe add a few pictures. Will update at the end of May.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: A fantastic wagon which seems more stable than other designs
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic wagon. It’s sturdy, well made, easy to pull on sand, and folds up really easily. I particularly love that the rear wheels slide out to the corners when you unfold the wagon- it makes it so much more stable than most wagons where the wheels stay in the center. We use it to carry way too much stuff to the beach/ soccer games/ the park, and it has been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good product with plenty of color options
customer_reviews.text: I like the various color/pattern options. I like the ruggedness of the wheels. Overall a good product. Wish the handle were more adjustable/versatile so I could effectively push as well as pull.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Great wagon
customer_reviews.text: This wagon is awesome. Sturdy. Folds up when not in use. Perfect for our weekend trips to the beach or lake when we need to carry lots of things
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: great wagon for all terrain
customer_reviews.text: literally all terrain. ive gone hiking for miles and miles on rocky mountains pulling 2 kids and i've only had one issue which the manifacturer has already taking care of. great wagon. strong build
customer_reviews.author: eddie car

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work in soft sand
customer_reviews.text: Does not pull through soft sand. Wheels just dig in. Apparently there is no wagon that is designed to work in soft sand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yellow paisley
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my yellow paisley wagon! It’s perfect for baseball season! Not too heavy, easy to fold up and pulls really well.
customer_reviews.author: Maegan

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Awesome wheels
customer_reviews.text: Awesome wagon and the wheels are great. I love how they ride without making too much noise. The locking mechanism on the handle did break easily though all the basics still function as needed. I have yet to try on sand but otherwise a great buy
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: A Must have!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how I ever lived without it!! It’s amazing
customer_reviews.author: Italia McCain

customer_reviews.title: Love this wagon for the beach and soccer field - wherever you need to take it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! While I don't think that any wagon will pull great in soft sand, this one did not do a bad job. It definitely works great in packed/firm sand.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Hazelwood

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Designed Handle - must fold wagon to fit in car
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews about the handle being a problem. Now I understand why, as handle will not fold back and requires me to fold the wagon each time to fit it in my SUV. And folding it is a pain - easy to pinch fingers. I was planning to just keep wagon open with my craft supplies already loaded. Would be easier and more efficient than folding and opening and reloading/unloading my supplies in the parking lot each time. I use to carry my craft supplies to and from my after-school classes. I did keep wagon as really nice design (very arty) and it does seem sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Great wagon
customer_reviews.text: This is a great wagon for me to bring up my groceries and I can store it easily!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lu Horkay

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new wagon! It helps so much and is great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Renae

customer_reviews.title: Is much nicer than the others I’ve looked at. Quality. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Large tires help in all terrains. Folds so easily. Is much nicer than the others I’ve looked at. Quality.
customer_reviews.author: Cindi Billmaier

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for walks and folds nicely. Love the big wheels. Looks to be very durable. Glad I purchased
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: I love my wagon. I purchased it go use for quilting retreats to carry my quilting supplies in.
customer_reviews.author: Northern Gale

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for the beach sand! Works great carrying our gear to the camper also.
customer_reviews.author: S D Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Well made! The color is so pretty! Nice!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE!!!!!! It is super nice when I want to put my cases of wine and other items in it instead of making multiple trips from the SUV to upstairs. Extremely well made! Great for my lazy dog who wants to flop on the sidewalk when I try to get in a brisk walk! 🤦🏽‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Brenda M

product_meta.title: Creative Outdoor Collapsible Folding Wagon Cart for Kids and Pets | All Terrain | Beach Park Garden Sports & Camping | Paisley Yellow
product_meta.description: Color:Paisley/YellowWhether it’s game day, a party at the beach, picnic at the park, or a group camping trip, the All-Terrain Folding Wagon is always a big winner. It is easy to set up. It opens in 3 easy steps; remove sleeve, unfold and enjoy. It is made up of steel frame, canvas fabric and . The weight capacity is 120 lbs. The Folding Wagon folds up to fit in most car trunks. It features cup holders and front swivel wheels.
feature_bullets: ✔️ BUILT TOUGH: The collapsible folding all terrain wagon from Creative Outdoor Distributor is built with a steel frame and durable denier blend fabric - it can support up to 150 lbs.

✔️ 360-DEGREE SWIVEL WHEELS: The wagon is designed to be pulled behind you - the front wheels have a 360-degree swivel allowing you to maneuver around obstacles. The smooth operating swivel design allows this wagon to glide and rotate effortlessly!

✔ TRAVEL-READY: Take children to the park, head to the local farmers market, work around the garden or yard, tailgating, shopping, music festivals, beach trips, picnics, or camping - this wagon handles it all. This foldable cart is extremely portable when not in use. Simply fold it up and store it in the trunk of your car, closet, or garage. When you need it - pull it out and expand.
✔ REMOVABLE FABRIC: The denier fabric easily removes for cleaning. Velcro and button snaps secure fabric to the frame. To wash, simply remove and hand wash or hose down.
✔️ DIMENSIONS: Unfolded - 44"L X 19.75"W X 47.5"H | Folded - 10.5"L X 19.75"W X 30.5"H

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars50 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
